title: Process an Inpatient Discharge
description: A unit clerk needs to process the discharge for a patient who has been cleared to go home.

tasks.description: Receive the discharge order from the physician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the discharge order is signed and present in the patient's chart.

tasks.description: Process the discharge ADT message in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the patient's status to 'Discharged'.

tasks.description: Update the bed management system to show the patient's bed is now 'dirty' and requires cleaning.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the bed status, triggering a notification to environmental services.
